Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 20th overall pick, by Boston in 1969...
Injured on 4/24/1969 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 6/28/1969 with a Stiff Neck, out for 6 days...
Injured on 5/28/1970 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/18/1970 with a Sprained Ankle, out for 3 days...
Injured on 5/1/1971 with a Bruised Ribs, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/16/1975 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 4/9/1977 with a Broken Finger, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 9/2/1977 with a Pinched Nerve Neck, out for 5 days...
Released by Boston on 3/2/1978...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 5/19/1978 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit on 6/17/1978, off Bill Slayback (OAK)...
Injured on 6/22/1981 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Hit first career homerun on 6/4/1982, off Tom Seaver (CAL)...
Injured on 5/2/1983 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Released by Cleveland on 7/7/1983...
Drafted in 2nd round, 26th overall pick, by Texas in 1985...
Traded from Texas to Chicago (A) on 5/12/1990 (Going to TEX: CF L. Dykstra. Going to CHW: C J. Flaherty, P J. Nelson)...
Earned first career win on 9/16/1992...
